directions: Stir mayonnaise, cornichons, dill, capers, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, garlic, and cayenne pepper together in a bowl.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons capers, drained and coarsely chopped
1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, or more to taste
1 pinch cayenne pepper, or more to taste
title: Chef John's Remoulade Sauce
